title: Fortress (1986 TV movie)
description:
"Fortress" explores a shocking concept which shows how easily a borderline between a victim and an attacker can be crossed. The children and the teacher, calm and peaceful by nature, when driven beyond their limits by the kidnappers, eventually respond with a cruelty and fury extending that of their oppressors. 

In this movie, A group of crazed Aussie group of thugs, kidnap a group of students in a school house and hold them hostage. A movie, with a plot that doesn&#039;t look promising at first, manages to stabilized itself with all the suspense. It maybe isn&#039;t the best of movies, but all the thrills, and chills are all in the right place, and it isn&#039;t such a bad movie to watch.

Resolution: 576x416
Framerate: 23.976
Length: 1 hour 27 minutes 56 seconds
